# opencti_vocabulary (Resource)

```terraform
resource "opencti_vocabulary" "test" {
  name        = "test"
  description = "Test report"
  category    = "report_types_ov"
}

output "test_vocabulary" {
  value = format("%s_%s", opencti_vocabulary.test.name, opencti_vocabulary.test.category)
}
```

### Required

- `category` (String)
- `description` (String)
- `name` (String)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
